vars.payload:
<style type="text/css">

	body { background-color: #ebebeb;}
	.thumbBlock_holder {
		width:100px !important;
		height:100px !important;
		float:left !important;
		font-family: 'Open Sans' !important;
		font-size: 18px !important;
				margin-top:10px !important;
				margin-left: 13px !important;
	}
	.video-title { padding-left: 10px;}
	.branding { padding-left: 123px; text-transform: uppercase;}

	.syndicatedItem { background-color:white !important;}
	div[data-item-id] {

		-webkit-box-shadow: 0 2px 2px #afb0b2;
		-moz-box-shadow: 0 2px 2px #afb0b2;
		box-shadow: 0 2px 2px #afb0b2;
		width: 100% !important;
		margin: 10px 0 0 0 !important;
		padding: 10px 10px 0px 0px;
		text-align: left;
		min-height: 120px
	}


	</style>
	<link href='http://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:300italic,400italic,600italic,700italic,800italic,400,300,600,700,800' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>

vars.payload:
<script>
  
  (function() {
    var moveAdsTimeout;
    var slideTransitionEvents = 'desktop_slide.slidenext desktop_slide.slideprev desktop_slide.prevarticle desktop_slide.nextarticle';

    var moveAds = function() {
      var imageHeight = $('.current_slide img').height();

      window.clearTimeout(moveAdsTimeout);

      if (imageHeight > 0) {
        var topHeightForImage = imageHeight + $('.subject_title').height() + 20;
        $('.to_move').css({
            'top':topHeightForImage,
            'position':'absolute'
        });         
      } else {
        moveAdsTimeout = window.setTimeout(function() {
          moveAds();
        }, 200);
      }

    }

    $(function() {
      moveAds();
      $(document).on(slideTransitionEvents, moveAds);
    });
  
  })();
  
</script>
